author: gemhuckstep
title: Amazing hotel
text:
Me and my fianc√© stayed here for 5 nights and it was amazing. The staff were so friendly and helpful, rooms were outstanding. The view from our 54th floor room took our breath away! Definitely recommend this hotel to others and when we come back to New York we will be staying here again without a doubt.
Room Tip: times square view will not disappoint! See more room tips
